Class MetricsTable

java.lang.Object

                      net.sourceforge.metrics.ui.MetricsTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable, java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionListener, org.eclipse.swt.internal.SWTEventListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.TreeListener
public class MetricsTable
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Tree
implements Constants, org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.TreeListener

TableTree specialized for metrics display. Specializations include lazy child creation and child sorting in descending metric value

Author:
Frank Sauer
